data.title: Gina Pancorbo on LinkedIn: Initiative on the evolving right to education in a lifelong perspective
data.meta_description: Happy to participate in this Formal Dialogue on behalf of Education International  to talk about teachers’ rights to decent working conditions, decent…
data.text: Join us tomorrow! Formal Dialogue on the Initiative on the evolving right to education – 14th of December 2023, 13:30 – 17:30 CET We're bringing together country representatives, international experts, UN agencies, civil society, and youth around a dynamic conversation about the evolving right to education. This upcoming Formal Dialogue is the perfect opportunity to share the Initiative findings, especially through our policy-oriented research paper. Let’s engage in these timely discussions and explore the next steps together! Don't miss out, be part of the discussion! Register on the website here: https://lnkd.in/ektNpj2s
